subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea recovered after conceding the fastest goal in F.A. Cup final history, beating Everton by 2-1 on Saturday in Wembley, England, to win the trophy for a fifth time.
snippet: Chelsea recovered after conceding the fastest goal in F.A. Cup final history, beating Everton by 2-1 on Saturday in Wembley, England, to win the trophy for a fifth time.
